title: Madonna's Daughter Lourdes Leon Looks Just Like Lady Gaga
text:
View photos Photo credit: Getty Images More

From Women's Health

Lourdes Leon, Madonna's daughter, made a high-wattage appearance at New York Fashion Week and now, fans on the internet are obsessed with how much she resembles Lady Gaga.

Check out the side-by-side below and let us know if you agree.

New York Fashion Week ended with a bang when Madonna's daughter Lourdes Leon sat front row at the Proenza Schouler show. While her appearance in and of itself was a big deal, fans on social media lost their minds when they realized the 22-year old resembles another member of pop royalty: Lady Gaga.

At the show, Leon, whose father is Cuban actor Carlos Leon, sat nearby Suki Waterhouse and Emily Ratajkowski and wore a simple white tank top, short-shorts, and cream booties—an outfit that Lady Gaga may have rocked in the late 2000s, before she blew up.

Twitter was quick to point out the similarities, of course, and it even caught Buzzfeed's attention.



Lourdes looks like Lady Gaga so much omg pic.twitter.com/5d8RUKHowb — Anthony 🌭 (@anorderlymess) September 12, 2019

Lourdes Leon (L) and Lady Gaga (R). Or are they the same person? In this essay I will... pic.twitter.com/nL49GiVzbI — Ξvan Ross Katz (@evanrosskatz) September 12, 2019





OMFG.... please correct me if i’m hallucinating. but i really saw that lourdes (madonna's daughter) is a lady gaga clone in her teens. or i’m delirious or i really saw it pic.twitter.com/ahdjcAOAQv — think wink (@abadcarma) September 13, 2019





It wasn't too long before the conspiracy theories began, either:

lady gaga looking like madonna’s daughter lourdes & madonna looking like lady gaga’s mother cynthia... yeah it’s a conspiracy theory that i’m actually interested in. pic.twitter.com/JkhHoHCv5B — jack (@fkajack) September 12, 2019

The idea had its detractors, and they were swift and passionate:

Little monsters comparing Lourdes to lady Gaga should be considered a crime! Lourdes sweetie I’m so sorry pic.twitter.com/vlYIPvRKbu — aunt lydia (@perrysus) September 12, 2019

I said that Lourdes and Lady Gaga don't look the same, which is true cause they don't. There's no similarity, having long black hair isn't a similarity. If that's enough to make you pressed or hurt your stan feelings isn't my problem. I didn't say anything wrong or rude. pic.twitter.com/yJDG8qKB0s — Madonna ✖️ Daily (@madonnadailyxxx) September 13, 2019

If you're still unconvinced, we've done the work for you. Here's a side-by-side of Lourdes, 22, and a 21-year-old Lady Gaga:

View photos Photo credit: Getty Images More

Our opinion? They definitely look alike thanks to that jet-black hair, strong Italian features, and a youthful stare. Leon is giving off A Star Is Born vibes with the outfit, too.

Of course, we had to include a picture of Lourdes and her mother, because clearly, this DNA runs deep:

And if you're wondering what Leon and Gaga look like together, well, we've got you:

Lady Gaga e Lourdes Maria, filha da Madonna appreciation tweet.#MPN #Shallow pic.twitter.com/TmOAfiJVUT — Lady Gaga Views (@LG_Views) September 12, 2019

For more ways to live your best life plus all things Oprah, sign up for our newsletter!

You Might Also Like
description: Honestly, the resemblance is kind of striking.
